law.catch_line: Same—Penalties for violations of Sections 2-103.1 through 2-103.5.

text.section:
Sec. 2-103.6. Same—Penalties for violations of Sections 2-103.1 through 2-103.5.
Any person convicted of a violation of any of the provisions contained in Sections through shall be punishable by a fine not to exceed five hundred dollars ($500.00), or imprisonment not to exceed sixty (60) days in the County Jail, or both, at the discretion of the judge of the court of appropriate jurisdiction.
